name: Raticate
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.

attacks.name: Recruit
attacks.effect: Look at your opponent’s hand, choose a Supporter card you find there, and discard it. Then, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Extend Fang
attacks.effect: If Raticate has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.
